GillTheCat_DA.Inspection.1: This is Willy's pet cat. His little nametag indicates that his name is Gill.

ShadowPup_DA.Inspection.1: This is a strange little dog...
WitchsSlimeCat_DA.Inspection.1: This is a slime that resembles a cat. They don't seem too keen on people.
